channel.title: 🏢 Operations Research Department Naval Postgraduate School on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Operations Research Department Naval Postgraduate School on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On the Adversarial Robustness of Benjamini Hochberg
item.description: Even a few data changes can break the Benjamini-Hochberg (BH) procedure, a widely used multiple testing method, highlighting a critical vulnerability.
